description.en:
PAND is a way to build a peaceful community around the world. The main goal of PAND is to connect all people around the world without any limitation and no matter where you live!

Panda Finance (PAND) is a deflationary token based on ETH's main net (ERC 20). Whenever a transaction is approved with PAND, 5% of the transaction is distributed and removed from the total supply. Interested?
